options.title: -d
options.description: The first character of delim is used to terminate each input line, rather than newline. If delim is the empty string, mapfile will terminate a line when it reads a NUL character.

options.title: -n
options.description: Copy at most count lines. If count is 0, all lines are copied.

options.title: -O
options.description: Begin assigning to array at index origin. The default index is 0.

options.title: -s
options.description: Discard the first count lines read.

options.title: -t
options.description: Remove a trailing delim (default newline) from each line read.

options.title: -u
options.description: Read lines from file descriptor fd instead of the standard input.

options.title: -C
options.description: Evaluate callback each time quantum lines are read. The -c option specifies quantum.

options.title: -c
options.description: Specify the number of lines read between each call to callback.
